description: An electric motor is a mechanical device which converts electrical energy into mechanical energy.
heading: "Current","Torque","Electrical energy","Mechanical energy","Law of conservation of energy","Magnetic field"
head_description: "The rate at which electric charge flows through a surface.","A force that can induce or change the rotational motion of a body.","The energy made available by the flow of electric charge through a conductor.","It is the energy of an object due to its motion or position.","It states that energy can neither be created nor destroyed. The sum of all the energies in the system is constant.","The region surrounding a magnet where its influence is felt."
